function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unobserved factors such as environmental elements, weather, and attitudinal predispositions may impact the prevalence of obesity and chronic diseases.","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of the effects of built environment and density on obesity and chronic diseases, leading to misleading public health interventions.","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive data collection and analysis to account for unobserved factors, integrate qualitative research methods, and incorporate individual-level heterogeneity in modeling.","Technologies":"Advanced statistical modeling, qualitative research methods, individual-level data collection and analysis.","People":"Public health researchers, policymakers, urban planners.","Owner":"Public health research institutions, government health agencies."}]}
